mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate) VALUES(seq_reply.nextval,#{bno},#{reply},#{replyer},sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT rno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate FROM tbl_reply WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET reply = #{reply}, replyer = #{replyer}, updateDate = sysdate WHERE rno = #{rno}
